playForFunEarnForProfit: Have Fun Playing and Earn Profits!
homeSubtitle: Experience the ultimate new decentralized game. Begin playing today and multiply your deposit!
howWorksSubtitle: Lucky Hamster allows you to earn rewards by showcasing your foresight. Utilize your market knowledge or intuition to predict the future movement of the MATICUSD price. Make accurate predictions and receive a portion of the prize pool for that round!
transperancyText: Full transparency and honesty in our decentralized blockchain game. The results are stored on the public blockchain for verification. No manipulation or rigging - just fair play.
safetyText: Our blockchain tech ensures strong security and reliability. Predictions and transactions are encrypted and stored in a distributed node network, guarding against hacks and external risks.
opportunityText: Equal opportunities for all in our game. Experience and status are irrelevant - actively predict markets and earn rewards for accurate forecasts. We believe in equality for all.
rewardsText: Earn money with our game. Predict market movements, get tokens/cryptocurrency. Exchange rewards for cash or wick for games/investments. Financial success depends on your skills and intuition.
earnLikePartner: Are you ready to get a
earnLikePartnerSubtitle2: by subscribing to our telegram channel! Stay up to date with the latest news, updates and exclusive offers. Our telegram channel is an ideal way to be inside the project and receive additional rewards. Don't miss the opportunity to be among the first, subscribe right now!
createYourAccountSubtitle: Create a crypto wallet if you don't have one
connectBankAccountSubtitle: Connect your wallet to the appplication
startBuildPortfolioSubtitle: Predict the market movement and get reward
firstSubscribers: Subscribe to our telegram and get a bonus up to
faqText3: What is the basis of predictions?
faqText4: How is the integrity of the game ensured?
faqText5: What are the requirements for the participants of the game?
faqText6: What types of awards are available?
faqDescription1: In the game, you predict the movement of the market by indicating whether the price of an asset (MATIK cryptocurrency) will rise or fall. If your prediction is correct, you will receive a reward.
faqDescription2: To start the game, you need to connect your crypto-wallet to the platform and replenish your balance. Then you can start to predict the market movement and participate in the game.
faqDescription3: Predictions are based on data and statistics analysis, and participants can use their market knowledge or intuition to make decisions.
faqDescription4: The game runs on blockchain technology, where all predictions and results are recorded and stored on a public blockchain. This provides transparency and prevents the possibility of manipulation.
faqDescription5: In most cases, the game is available to persons who have reached the age of majority. Check the specific platform's terms and conditions for membership requirements.
faqDescription6: One type of reward is available in the game, including MATIС tokens, which can be exchanged for real money or used inside the game for further investments and predictions
